languages.text: "Отнюдь, Лорд-капитан. Одна мысль о произошедшем стягивает горло серо-синей удавкой. Осознавать вновь и вновь, сколь отчаянно подданные тебя ненавидят..." {n}К горлу подступает удушливый ком, и Кассия испуганно проводит ладонью над вашим плечом, словно сбрасывая осевший пепел. Становится легче.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Мне не стоит омрачать ваши цвета своими переживаниями".

traits.locale_text: "Отнюдь, Лорд-капитан. Одна мысль о произошедшем стягивает горло серо-синей удавкой. Осознавать вновь и вновь, сколь отчаянно подданные тебя ненавидят..." {n}К горлу подступает удушливый ком, и Кассия испуганно проводит ладонью над вашим плечом, словно сбрасывая осевший пепел. Становится легче.{/n} "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Мне не стоит омрачнять ваши цвета своими переживаниями".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."
languages.original_text: "Отнюдь, Лорд-капитан. Одна мысль о произошедшем стягивает горло серо-синей удавкой. languages.text: “恰恰相反，舰长大人。光是想到之前发生的事情，我就感觉仿佛有一条灰蓝色的绳索勒紧了我的喉咙。想想看，你一次又一次地意识到，你的臣民对你有多么恨之入骨……”{n}你感觉喉咙里仿佛冒出了一个令人窒息的肿块。卡西娅警觉起来，用手拍着你的肩膀，仿佛在抖落上面的灰烬一般。随后，窒息的感觉变轻了。{/n}“我很抱歉，舰长大人。我不该用我自己的痛苦，让你的颜色黯淡无光。”
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

traits.locale_text: “恰恰相反，舰长大人。光是想到之前发生的事情，我就感觉仿佛有一条灰蓝色的绳索勒紧了我的喉咙。想想看，你一次又一次地意识到，你的臣民对你有多么恨之入骨……”{n}你感觉喉咙里仿佛冒出了一个令人窒息的肿块。卡西娅警觉起来，用手拍着你的肩膀，仿佛在抖落上面的灰烬一般。随后，窒息的感觉变轻了。{/n}“我很抱歉，舰长大人。我不该用我自己的痛苦，让你的颜色黯淡无光。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

languages.text: «Al contrario, Lord Capitán. Solo con pensar en lo sucedido se me ata un nudo corredizo gris azulado en torno a la garganta. Darne cuenta una y otra vez de lo mucho que me odian mis súbditos...». {n}Sientes un nudo en la garganta. Alarmada, Cassia pasa la mano por tu hombro, como si quisiera quitarte algo de ceniza. Sientes alivio.{/n} «Lo siento, Lord Capitán. No pretendía oscurecer sus colores con mis propias dificultades».
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

traits.locale_text: «Al contrario, Lord Capitán. Solo con pensar en lo sucedido se me ata un nudo corredizo gris azulado en torno a la garganta. Darne cuenta una y otra vez de lo mucho que me odian mis súbditos...». {n}Sientes un nudo en la garganta. Alarmada, Cassia pasa la mano por tu hombro, como si quisiera quitarte algo de ceniza. Sientes alivio.{/n} «Lo siento, Lord Capitán. No pretendía oscurecer sus colores con mis propias dificultades».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それどころか、ロード・キャプテン。何が起こったのかを考えるだけで、私の喉には灰色の青い縄が巻きついたかのようになります。臣民がどれほど熱烈にあなたを憎んでいるか、何度も何度も思い知らされるのです…」{n}あなたは喉の奥に息詰まるようなしこりを感じた。警戒したカシアはあなたの肩に手のひらをやった。まるでそこに沈殿した灰を振り払うかのように。あなたは少し安堵する。{/n}「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。私自身の苦境のせいで、あなたの色彩を暗くすべきではありませんでした」
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

traits.locale_text: 「それどころか、ロード・キャプテン。何が起こったのかを考えるだけで、私の喉には灰色の青い縄が巻きついたかのようになります。臣民がどれほど熱烈にあなたを憎んでいるか、何度も何度も思い知らされるのです…」{n}あなたは喉の奥に息詰まるようなしこりを感じた。警戒したカシアはあなたの肩に手のひらをやった。まるでそこに沈殿した灰を振り払うかのように。あなたは少し安堵する。{/n}「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。私自身の苦境のせいで、あなたの色彩を暗くすべきではありませんでした」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Im Gegenteil, Lord Captain. Beim bloßen Gedanken daran, was geschehen ist, legt sich mir eine grau-blaue Henkersschlinge um den Hals. Wieder und wieder zu erkennen, wie glühend Eure Untertanen Euch hassen ..." {n}Du spürst einen Klumpen in deinem Hals, der dir das Atmen erschwert. Beunruhigt fährt Cassia dir mit der Handfläche über die Schulter, wie um Asche wegzuwischen, die dort gelandet ist. Du spürst etwas Erleichterung.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Ich hätte Eure Farben nicht mit meinen eigenen Mühen verdunkeln sollen."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

traits.locale_text: "Im Gegenteil, Lord Captain. Beim bloßen Gedanken daran, was geschehen ist, legt sich mir eine grau-blaue Henkersschlinge um den Hals. Wieder und wieder zu erkennen, wie glühend Eure Untertanen Euch hassen ..." {n}Du spürst einen Klumpen in deinem Hals, der dir das Atmen erschwert. Beunruhigt fährt Cassia dir mit der Handfläche über die Schulter, wie um Asche wegzuwischen, die dort gelandet ist. Du spürst etwas Erleichterung.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Ich hätte Eure Farben nicht mit meinen eigenen Mühen verdunkeln sollen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Bien au contraire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Rien que de penser à ce qu'il s'est passé, je sens une corde bleu-gris s'enrouler autour de mon cou. Prendre conscience, encore et encore, que vos propres sujets vous haïssent avec une telle ardeur... » {n}Quelque chose semble soudain vous obstruer la gorge. Cassia, alarmée par votre réaction, passe une main sur votre épaule comme pour y chasser une poussière, et vous vous sentez tout de suite mieux.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je n'aurais pas dû laisser mes tourments obscurcir vos couleurs. »
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

traits.locale_text: « Bien au contraire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Rien que de penser à ce qu'il s'est passé, je sens une corde bleu-gris s'enrouler autour de mon cou. Prendre conscience, encore et encore, que vos propres sujets vous haïssent avec une telle ardeur... » {n}Quelque chose semble soudain vous obstruer la gorge. Cassia, alarmée par votre réaction, passe une main sur votre épaule comme pour y chasser une poussière, et vous vous sentez tout de suite mieux.{/n} « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je n'aurais pas dû laisser mes tourments obscurcir vos couleurs. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Tam aksine Lord Kaptan. Olan bitenleri düşündükçe, boğazımı saran grimsi mavi renkteki ilmik daha da daralıyor sanki. Kullarımın benden ne kadar nefret ettiğini daha kaç kere görmem gerekiyor?" {n}Sözcükler boğazına ilmek ilmek düğümleniyor. Endişeye kapılan Cassia, omzuna konmuş bir parça külü silkelermişçesine bir elini orandan geçiriyor. İçin biraz rahatlıyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Kendi dertlerim yüzünden renklerini bulandırmamalıydım."
languages.original_text: "On the contrary, Lord Captain. The mere thought of what happened tightens a grey-blue slip noose around my throat. To realise, again and again, how fervently your subjects hate you..." {n}You feel a suffocating lump in your throat. Alarmed, Cassia passes a palm over your shoulder, as if shaking off some ash that settled there. You feel some relief.{/n} "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should not have darkened your colours with my own struggles."

traits.locale_text: "Tam aksine Lord Kaptan. Olan bitenleri düşündükçe, boğazımı saran grimsi mavi renkteki ilmik daha da daralıyor sanki. Kullarımın benden ne kadar nefret ettiğini daha kaç kere görmem gerekiyor?" {n}Sözcükler boğazına ilmek ilmek düğümleniyor sanki. Endişeye kapılan Cassia, omzuna konan bir parça külü silkelermişçesine bir elini üstünden geçiriyor. İçin biraz rahatlıyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Kendi dertlerim yüzünden senin de renklerini bulandırmamalıydım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
